item.title: Building an API using the Swagger toolchain
item.description: We have been building APIs for ages, with varying standards and design styles - SOAP web services, gRPC, REST, and until recently GraphQL. Instead of declaring a winning design style, I believe that each one of these design styles stands their ground, and it depends on the use case when to use which style.

item.title: Roundup of API Platforms and Specifications
item.description: While researching for full, end-to-end, lifecycle API management tools, I discovered many that fit the bill. In this post, I compare some popular API platforms and specification formats.
